user_query: I'm interested in investing in cryptocurrencies. Can you give me an overview of the top 10 coins by market cap and their current prices? Additionally, provide me with the latest news about the cryptocurrency market.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current market data for the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market cap.
Extract the current prices for the top 10 cryptocurrencies fetched in Subtask 1.
Gather the latest news articles related to the cryptocurrency market.
